location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Proposed Reservation for Refinery, Water Wells and Lines to Sitra. SK. No. 120. Corrected Nov. 6, 1936’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:256 x 512 mm, on sheet 278 x 537 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Blueprint sketch map dated 1 Mar 1936 and revised 6 November 1936, produced by the Bahrein Petroleum Company. Enclosed with a letter no. C/504-10/1, dated 26 November 1936 (folio 175).Shows the proposed reservation of land for the refinery at Sitrah, Bahrain including the 300 acres designated for the refinery site. Indicates the location of the triangulation station, water and oil wells reservation, the 80 feet wide strip of land, and the Sitra Terminal. Corrected coordinates and measurements given.
